feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for New Zealand issued by MetService

entry.title: Severe Thunderstorm Watch
entry.summary:
Amended at 7.05am
Rain with heavy falls is expected to affect the Bay of Plenty and the far north of Gisborne during Wednesday morning, and there is a moderate risk of downpours with rainfall intensities 25 to 40 mm/h for those areas.
Rainfall of this intensity can cause surface and/or flash flooding, especially about low-lying areas such as streams, rivers or narrow valleys, and may also lead to slips. Driving conditions will also be hazardous with surface flooding and poor visibility in heavy rain.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect a further 20 to 50 mm of rain on top of what has already fallen. Peak rates of 25 to 40 mm/h possible in localised downpours. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Orange Warning has been decreased to Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect a further 30 to 50 mm of rain on top of what has already fallen, especially north of Ruatoria. Peak rates of 15 to 25 mm/h expected but possibly 25 to 40 mm/h in localised downpours. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Orange Warning has been decreased to Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: North to northeast winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Watch has been decreased to Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northerly winds may approach severe gale. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: Timing for onset of Strong Wind Watch delayed by 3 hours.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
